name: Mini Hentai Puzzles
description:
Mini Hentai Puzzles brings sexy hentai girls and a new, minimalistic jigsaw puzzle mechanism to your computer.
Chose between 6 different puzzle sizes and around 20 different hot pictures and start completing your own jigsaw hentai waifu.
Piece by piece you will need to use your logic and understanding of anime girls in order to put together your very own hentai waifu.
The reward is the finished picture and the feeling of accomplishment and satisfaction.

Features:

  • 20 different puzzles
  • 6 different puzzle sizes from 4 to 100 pieces per puzzle
  • New, minimalist puzzle gameplay
  • Peaceful puzzling atmosphere
  • Beautiful and sexy puzzle images
  • A true test of your understanding of anime girls
  • Achievements
